raw.title: [BIP-459] Enable TetuBAL/20WETH-80BAL Gauge [Polygon]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/579

**Summary:**
The purpose of this proposal is to enable gauge for the newly [created](https://app.balancer.fi/#/polygon/pool/0x7af62c1ebf97034b7542ccec13a2e79bbcf34380000000000000000000000c13) tetuBal/20WETH-80BAL with updated AMP (**20** instead of **500**) to align with the recommendations from the balancer core team and community. All the other parameters are the same as in the existing [pool](https://app.balancer.fi/#/polygon/pool/0xb797adfb7b268faeaa90cadbfed464c76ee599cd0002000000000000000005ba).

Previous gauge [proposal](https://forum.balancer.fi/t/bip-8-enable-tetubal-20weth-80bal-gauge/3335)

**References/Useful links:**

> Link to:
*    Previous gauge [proposal](https://forum.balancer.fi/t/bip-8-enable-tetubal-20weth-80bal-gauge/3335)
* Website -[ https://tetu.io/ 2 ](https://tetu.io/)
* Documentation -[ Introduction - Tetu ](https://docs.tetu.io/tetu-io/)
* Github Page -[ Tetu · GitHub ](https://github.com/tetu-io)
* Communities -[ Tetu ]()

**Protocol Description:**

Tetu is an asset management protocol that implements automated yield farming strategy for users.

**Motivation:**
To maintain tetuBal peg and attract more liquidity to the pool. It will be beneficial for both Balancer and Tetu protocols.

 
**Specifications:**

1. Governance:[ Multi Sig - Tetu ](https://docs.tetu.io/tetu-io/security/multi-sig)
2. Oracles: No
3. Audits:[ docs.tetu.io ](https://docs.tetu.io/tetu-io/security/audits)
4. Centralization vectors: n/a
5. Market History: Tetu token can be volatile in the certain market conditions.


Composable Stable Pool: [0x7aF62C1ebf97034B7542CcEC13a2e79BbcF34380](https://polygonscan.com/address/0x7aF62C1ebf97034B7542CcEC13a2e79BbcF34380)

Gauge: [0xF6A814eD60653Cb0e36DA247B01E6309318328d4](https://etherscan.io/address/0xF6A814eD60653Cb0e36DA247B01E6309318328d4)

### Technical Specification
The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:`0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:
gauge(address):`0xF6A814eD60653Cb0e36DA247B01E6309318328d4`
gaugeType(string): `Polygon`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-624] Enable rsETH / WETH Gauge (Arbitrum)
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1032

**Summary:**

Kelp proposes to add a veBAL gauge for the rsETH/WETH pool on Arbitrum
https://app.balancer.fi/#/arbitrum/pool/0x90e6cb5249f5e1572afbf8a96d8a1ca6acffd73900000000000000000000055c

**Child Gauge:** https://arbiscan.io/address/0x59907f88C360D576Aa38dba84F26578367F96b6C#code

**Root Gauge:** https://etherscan.io/address/0x061130d4715FCD4828BfCAf6B1a9B93DF5e6e4c9

**References/Useful links:**

• Website: https://kelpdao.xyz/restake/

• Documentation: [Introduction | Kelp](https://kelp.gitbook.io/kelp)

• Github Public Repo: https://github.com/Kelp-DAO/KelpDAO-contracts

• Twitter: https://twitter.com/KelpDAO

**Protocol Description:**

rsETH is one of the largest LST-based liquid restaked token on the EigenLayer ecosystem. It represents the liquidity of the underlying assets that have been deposited on Kelp. rsETH provides liquidity for the restaked positions, accumulates the rewards, and simplifies rewards management for AVSs

Kelp has more than 260,000 ETH worth of assets restaked by over 40,000 users across multiple L2s. All of this is within 4 months of launch

By providing liquidity for the restaked positions, wrsETH allows for a seamless experience to engage with DeFi activities and maximize rewards.

**Motivation:**

Kelp is seeking to establish the [rsETH/ETH on Arbitrum] and on Balancer to further enrich the liquidity of rsETH. This move aims to enhance the trading experience of users, making it more accessible for users while generating additional value for the Kelp community.

**Specifications:**

1. **Governance:** Kelp currently operates with a multi-sig wallet. The protocol is planning to transition to decentralized governance soon
2. **Oracles:** Kelp is working with Redstone to create price feeds of rsETH.
3. **Audits:** Kelp’s smart contracts are audited by Sigma Prime and Code4rena.
4. Sigma Prime Report: https://kelpdao.xyz/audits/smartcontracts/SigmaPrime.pdf
5. Code4rena: [Code4rena | Keeping high severity bugs out of production](https://code4rena.com/reports/2023-11-kelp)
6. MixBytes: [KELPDAO LRT-ETH SECURITY AUDIT REPORT](https://kelpdao.xyz/audits/smartcontracts/mixbytes.pdf)
7. **Centralization vectors:** Centralization vectors currently are around upgradeability via proxy multi-sig and front-end hosting.

Kelp's goal is to migrate Kelp away from these vectors.

- . **Market History:** Kelp has seen meteoric growth in TVL in the last few weeks with TVL over 260k ETH and >40,000 holders of rsETH across mainnet and L2s.



Arbitrum pool: [Balancer](TO BE ADDED)
Rate provider: https://arbiscan.io/address/0x3222d3de5a9a3ab884751828903044cc4adc627e#code

- . **Value:** This will be the first wrsETH balancer pool on Arbitrum and is aimed at providing primary liquidity for wrsETH on ARB.

**Technical Specifications:**

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig `eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the `addGauge` function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0x061130d4715FCD4828BfCAf6B1a9B93DF5e6e4c9`

gaugeType(string): `Arbitrum`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-580] Enable sfrxETH / cbETH pool [Base]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/884

## Summary:

* This is a proposal to enable a Balancer gauge for a sfrxETH/cbETH pool on Balancer on Base.
* This will be a core pool.
* The pool has been launched [here](https://app.balancer.fi/#/base/pool/0x98bedb6a3c0b6feebbe662e6419481a6877d9681000000000000000000000104)

## References/Useful links:

Link to:

• [Website](https://frax.finance/)

• [Documentation](https://docs.frax.finance/)

• [Github Page](https://github.com/FraxFinance/frax-solidity)


## Protocol Description:

sfrxETH is a staked interest bearing version of FRAX’s staked ETH (frxETH). Coinbase Wrapped Staked ETH (cbETH) represents your staked Ethereum (ETH) in a tradable form. You can unwrap cbETH at any time. cbETH provides flexibility to sell, transfer, or use it. You can move cbETH to a personal wallet and trade it outside the Coinbase platform.

## Motivation:

As a joint effort with FRAX, we aim to increase liquidity of FRAX, sFRAX, frxETH, sfrxETH, to make Balancer a liquidity hub for Frax assets on Base. The BAL gauge and core pool status will facilitate the process.

## Specifications:

* Governance: FRAX governance process can be seen [here](https://docs.frax.finance/smart-contracts/governance) and their snapshot [here](https://snapshot.org/#/frax.eth).
* Oracles: Chainlink feed for rate can be found [here](https://data.chain.link/feeds/base/base/sfrxETH-frxETH).
* Audits: See [here](https://docs.frax.finance/other/audits)
* Centralization vectors: see [here](https://docs.frax.finance/frax-ether/overview).
* Market History: See [here](https://docs.frax.finance/frax-ether/frxeth-and-sfrxeth)
* Value: Balancer will earn the protocol fee on interest bearing sfrxETH and cbETH in the pool and so will LPs. The BIP-19 flywheel will incentivize TVL to grow here with trading volume and our staked ethereum pillars will continue to have Balancer as their ideal liquidity destination.

Link to pool: https://app.balancer.fi/#/base/pool/0x98bedb6a3c0b6feebbe662e6419481a6877d9681000000000000000000000104

Link to child gauge: [0x1cadBEFEB5461a671CfAAf5faC237aF00baC0B1c](https://basescan.org/address/0x1cadBEFEB5461a671CfAAf5faC237aF00baC0B1c#code)

Link to root gauge: [0x3CFfb5d5Db1dA8AA58908e54C03a7f8a7edb233c](https://etherscan.io/address/0x3CFfb5d5Db1dA8AA58908e54C03a7f8a7edb233c)

## Technical Specification:

The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860 will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at 0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0x3CFfb5d5Db1dA8AA58908e54C03a7f8a7edb233c`

gaugeType(string): `Base`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-609] Enable Gauge for wrsETH/WETH [Optimism]
raw.author: 0x7c2eA10D3e5922ba3bBBafa39Dc0677353D2AF17
raw.body:
PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/970

Summary:

Kelp proposes to add a veBAL gauge for the [wrsETH/WETH] on Balancer]

Child Gauge: https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0xA15C762974BA3aC59abc305FbA097A0E564F7470

Root Gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0x65a5C255cfDDb99CAcCaCeE6f0FA63F3AB886e79

References/Useful links:

• Website: https://kelpdao.xyz/restake/

• Documentation: https://kelp.gitbook.io/kelp

• Github Public Repo: https://github.com/Kelp-DAO/KelpDAO-contracts

• Twitter: https://twitter.com/KelpDAO

Protocol Description:

rsETH is one of the largest LST-based liquid restaked token on the EigenLayer ecosystem. It represents the liquidity of the underlying assets that have been deposited on Kelp. rsETH provides liquidity for the restaked positions, accumulates the rewards, and simplifies rewards management for AVSs

Kelp has more than 260,000 ETH worth of assets restaked by over 40,000 users across multiple L2s. All of this is within 4 months of launch

By providing liquidity for the restaked positions, wrsETH allows for a seamless experience to engage with DeFi activities and maximize rewards.

Motivation:

Kelp is seeking to establish the [wrsETH/ETH on Optimism] and on Balancer to further enrich the liquidity of wrsETH. This move aims to enhance the trading experience of users, making it more accessible for users while generating additional value for the Kelp community.

Specifications:

1. Governance: Kelp currently operates with a multi-sig wallet. The protocol is planning to transition to decentralized governance soon

2. Oracles: Kelp is working with Redstone to create price feeds of rsETH.

3. Audits: Kelp’s smart contracts are audited by Sigma Prime and Code4rena.

  1. Sigma Prime Report: https://kelpdao.xyz/audits/smartcontracts/SigmaPrime.pdf
  2. Code4rena: [Code4rena | Keeping high severity bugs out of production](https://code4rena.com/reports/2023-11-kelp)
  3. MixBytes: [KELPDAO LRT-ETH SECURITY AUDIT REPORT](https://kelpdao.xyz/audits/smartcontracts/mixbytes.pdf)

4. Centralization vectors: Centralization vectors currently are around upgradeability via proxy multi-sig and front-end hosting.

Our goal is to migrate Kelp away from these vectors.

5. Market History: Kelp has seen meteoric growth in TVL in the last few weeks with TVL over 260k ETH and >40,000 holders of rsETH across mainnet and L2s.

The balancer pools are already live and are available on Optimism

Optimism pool: https://app.balancer.fi/#/optimism/pool/0x73a7fe27fe9545d53924e529acf11f3073841b9e000000000000000000000133

6. Value: The balancer pool is the 2nd liquidity pool on Optimism and is aimed at providing liquidity to the growing community.

Technical Specifications:

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig `eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at 0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd and call the `addGauge` function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0x65a5C255cfDDb99CAcCaCeE6f0FA63F3AB886e79`

gaugeType(string): `Optimism`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-469] Enable BEETS/rETH gauge w/ 2% emission cap [Optimism]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/601


**Summary:**
> This is a proposal to enable BAL gauge for BEETS 80 / rETH 20 pool on optimism with 2% emission cap

**References/Useful links:**

> Link to:
    • Website https://op.beets.fi
    • Documentation https://docs.beets.fi/
    • Github Page https://github.com/beethovenxfi  
    • Twitter https://twitter.com/beethoven_x

**Protocol Description:**

> Beethoven X is a friendly fork of Balancer originated from Fantom back in 2021, and has been an essential part of the Balancer. It has been co-operating the Balancer deployment on optimism since 2022. $BEETS is the governance token of Beethoven X; on optimism, the token is bridged by Layerzero as a OFT. 

**Motivation:**

> This is to establish $BEETS liquidity on optimism. $BEETS token (the old multichain bridged version) has been used to incentivize liquidity through direct emission and voting incentives on optimism. The $BEETS token has recently been migrated to the Layerzero bridged version due to the multichain incidence (see [governance vote](https://snapshot.org/#/beets.eth/proposal/0xa3454614baec1abe0905d0abe6d1f08b53cae73879000dfcc8bd7c872419910c)). Hence, moving on the layerzero bridged version will be used. The pool will facilitate trading and holding of $BEETS on optimism. 

**Specifications:**
 
1. **Governance:** The BEETS governance is through maBEETS on fantom. 

2. **Oracles:** No

3. **Audits:** BeethovenX is a friendly fork of Balancer and has been [independently audited](https://docs.beets.fi/ecosystem/security). 

4. **Centralization vectors:** No

5. **Market History:** $BEETS token has a history for more than 2 years and is a well established token. 
 
6. **Value:** This pool will be the primary liquidity of $BEETS on optimism. The pairing with interest bearing $rETH would also earn protocol fees for Balancer. 


Pool address: https://op.beets.fi/pool/0xc1f46ce83439886f0ea9c21512b36e7e67239d2c000200000000000000000108

Child gauge: https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x53bFf7a10181E4Fa2a92011dE9816220E0DaDd41

Root gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0x20D03f9D0304744891881e6ac1D45b996e7F39B5#code

The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:`0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:
gauge(address):`0x20D03f9D0304744891881e6ac1D45b996e7F39B5`
gaugeType(string): `Optimism`

choices: No, this is not the way

decision.summary: This proposal aims to enable the YieldFi yUSD/USDC gauges on Balancer v3 Base deployment, expected to attract additional TVL and create high-yield stable opportunities on Base, supported by strong timeline voting metrics and neutral forum sentiment.
key_arguments_for: Strong timeline vote support with 100% lead ratio and high stability for 'Yes, let's do it' option.
Historical similar proposals enabling gauges showed positive community support and successful passage.
Market impacts of current proposal show positive price impact (+7.12%) despite slight TVL decline (-1.64%).
Neutral forum sentiment indicates no significant opposition; early incentives on Arbitrum showed TVL growth to $700k+ in less than 2 months.
key_arguments_against: Slight TVL decline (-1.64%) post proposal which may indicate minor risk in liquidity retention.
Forum discussion lacks positive sentiment or explicit community enthusiasm.

evidence.quote: Forum comments are neutral; first comment provides detailed technical and motivational information without opposition.
Timeline metrics show 100% vote lead and stability for 'Yes, let's do it' option with all voters supporting this choice.
Authoritative governance token address is 0xba100000625a3754423978a60c9317c58a424e3D (BAL token).

available_choices: No, this is not the way
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'Yes, let's do it' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- The voting timeline shows unanimous and stable support for enabling the YieldFi gauges, indicating strong community consensus in favor.
- Forum discussion is neutral but informational, with no opposition raised, aligning with the vote trend.
- Similar past proposals enabling gauges on Base and Mainnet passed successfully and helped grow ecosystem activity, though with some TVL declines; these lessons suggest monitoring post-deployment but do not warrant rejection.
- Market data shows positive token price impact despite a slight TVL drop, supporting a cautious but positive outlook.
- Overall, the recommendation to 'Change' aligns with voting and neutral sentiment, reflecting community views and maximizing long-term protocol benefit.
